audioText: Mon frère est venu me voir hier après le travail.
question: What did the speaker's brother do yesterday?
options: He came to see the speaker after work
He called the speaker after work
He visited their parents after work
He went to work with the speaker
explanation: The text states 'Mon frère est venu me voir hier après le travail' - My brother came to see me yesterday after work. 'Venu' is the past participle of 'venir' (to come), used here in the passé composé.
